requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7, 8, 10
  • Processor: 3 GHz Quad Core Processor
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 11 compatible GPU, 4GB dedicated VRAM (GeForce GTX 970 / Radeon RX 480)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Disk space will change
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 4 GHz Quad Core Processor
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 11 compatible GPU, 6GB dedicated VRAM (GeForce GTX 1060 / Radeon RX 580)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Disk space will change

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 10
  • Processor: i5 7th gen
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce RTX 1050
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: VR headset required (VIVE Cosmos, VIVE Pro, Oculus Rift, Oculus Rift S / Quest + Link, Valve Index, Windows Mixed Reality)
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 11
  • Processor: i7 8th gen
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce RTX 2060
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: VR headset required (VIVE Cosmos, VIVE Pro, Oculus Rift, Oculus Rift S / Quest + Link, Valve Index, Windows Mixed Reality)
